osu.set_mode_error:
Invalid mode.
Valid modes:
`0` - osu!std
`1` - osu!taiko
`2` - osu!catch
`3` - osu!mania

Beatmap not found.
Maybe the map was deleted?

osu.whatif_embed_title: What if {user} got a {pp}PP play on {name}?
osu.whatif_time_waste: A score of `{pp}pp` (`{weighted_pp}`pp weighted) for {user} would not be a top play and would most likely be just wasting their time.
osu.whatif_text: A score of `{pp}pp` (`{weighted_pp}`pp weighted) for {user} would be their #{rank} top play and increase their total pp to `{total_pp}pp` (+`{pp_diff}pp`).
